    • Method Detail

      • countInversion

        public static long countInversion(int[] arr)
        Counts the number of inversions using divide and conquer in nlogn time
        Parameters:
        arr - the original int array
        n - the length of the array
        Returns:
        the number of inversions in nlogn time

      • countSplitInversion

        private static long countSplitInversion(int[] left,
                       int[] right,
                       int[] result)
        Counts the number of split inversions, i.e. inversions that occur in both halves of the array
        Parameters:
        left - the left side of the original int array
        right - the right side of the original int array
        n - the length of the array
        Returns:
        the number of split inversions

      • countLines

        public static int countLines(java.lang.String filename)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Counts the number of lines in a text file
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the text file
        Returns:
        the number of lines in the text file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when the file cannot be opened
